text: 5.3: Lo 23.21; Ru 22.3; Zo 13.2Ana maaŋ nzuaim, Pita mbaram khaŋ ana nzuai, “Ananaias, ndu ram muuŋgiap fhura Satan garim, ana zav ndu ndava vhen vergap, ndu nzuaim, ndu Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaara guiguigi. Ndu mbarara! Ndu mba nuianeŋ ndi mbaim, mbe ne ga vhezgi ŋkɨɨa, ndu nta shɨrav wo ndi mbari ndiga zorgi.
